Monument signs are the most common type of signs you will see in the entrance of schools, churches, and other public facilities because they create a good impression on anyone who sees it.

Monument signs are free-standing and usually made from stone, brick, marble, or metal. It also lists down all the information you need to know about the facility, as well as other key information you want to include. These signs also match the business, providing a cohesive experience for anyone who sees it for the first time. It also sets the business apart from its competition because they are a big investment.

If you want to use this type of sign for your business, you should check out our services here at Royal Signs & Awnings. We can design the sign to match your business goals, location, and budget.

Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation with a Houston Monument Sign Specialist!

An Impressive Entrance

Many businesses will benefit from monument signs, especially those who want to give a lasting impression to anyone who sees the sign. The sign also provides a sense of permanence for your business.

These signs are often located at the entrance of the business space, and they are easy to read. It also does not require any other structures to support it because it is designed to stand on its own. It is also made from high-quality and durable materials, which will protect it from aging and degrading. These are some of the reasons why many companies invest in these signs.

Multi-Tenant Monument Signs

Monument signs are often used for business parks, shopping centers, and multi-building facilities. The signs can be customized to feature all the different businesses and companies located in the center as a directory for people to see it, or we can put the information you want to display for people to see.

Custom Signs for Every Budget

Our sign company, serving Houston, TX, can also customize the signs to match your specification, budget, and business goals. We can use various materials for your monument signs and design them in any size you want.

No matter where you want to use the signs or how simple you want it to look, we have everything needed to get the signs made for your needs.

Free Monument Sign Consultation

When it comes to signage of all shapes and sizes, you can not go wrong with Royal Signs & Awnings. Our Houston sign company can design the perfect signs for your business and make sure that they have all the information needed by your customers to check your offerings even if they only see your sign from a mile away.

Call Royal Signs & Awnings today at (281) 645-9935 for a Free Consultation with a Houston Monument Sign Specialist!
